mapper.select: select mid, mname, mpassword, mssn, memail, maddress, mphone, msince, mprefergenre, mgrade, mprofileimg, mtotalpay from member where mid = #{mid}

insert into member (mid, mname, mpassword, mssn, memail, maddress, mphone, msince, mprefergenre, mgrade, mtotalpay, mrole) values(#{mid}, #{mname}, #{mpassword}, #{mssn}, #{memail}, #{maddress}, #{mphone}, #{msince}, #{mprefergenre}, #{mgrade}, #{mtotalpay}, #{mrole})
